Class MeleeEnemy

java.lang.Object
entity.base.Entity
entity.base.Enemy
entity.base.MeleeEnemy
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class MeleeEnemy extends Enemy
MeleeEnemy Represents a melee enemy in the game
